images.description: SDSS image of region near the stars (above and below the label), one of which is probably the actual NGC 4471, also showing spiral galaxy NGC 4470, elliptical galaxies NGC 4467 and M49, and elliptical galaxy PGC 41185 (which is often misidentified as NGC 4471)
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 41185, which is often misidentified as NGC 4471
